metadata.dc:author: Saralegui, A
Royo, P
Palacio, P
metadata.dc:description: Asthenia (or fatigue) is one of the most common symptoms in palliative patients. Methylphenidate is currently being assessed for treating this condition. A review of related literature published to date was performed, revealing methylphenidate to be a safe drug which could decrease fatigue in palliative patients with a tolerable side-effects profile.
metadata.dc:title: Revisi√≥n sobre el uso del metilfenidato para el tratamiento de la astenia en pacientes paliativos.
[Use of methylphenidate in palliative patients with asthenia: a review].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales del sistema sanitario de Navarra
